name: Simulator Crash War Car
description:
Simulator Crash War Car
Break Auto Simulator war - a game application where you can joke to break the car for fun!
Car broke as a joke, disassemble it into parts! Mash machine can be pressing on her finger! Will appeal to all! It is safe to break the car in the game! It will look like after the accident!
Play your friends and loved ones!
The app does not bear any harm and is only for fun! Gently press the screen to avoid damaging it!
Thank you for playing with us leave us your feedback and we try to make our games even more interesting!
